_help.overview: Controls which tools the agent can use at runtime.

global.enabled: Master switch — set false to disable ALL tools.
global.mode: 'off' = disabled, 'allowlist' = only tools listed in allowedTools, 'full' = unrestricted.
global.allowedTools: Tool names (or prefixes) permitted when mode is 'allowlist'. Ignored in 'full' mode.

tools.description: Per-tool overrides. Each key is a tool name with its own policy.

shell.allowedPrefixes: Command prefixes allowed when mode is 'allowlist' (e.g. ['echo', 'git']).
shell.timeoutMs: Max execution time in ms (capped at 120000).
shell.maxOutputChars: Truncate output beyond this limit (capped at 200000).
shell.allowAnyCwd: If false, cwd must be within the project workspace.

_help.env_fallbacks: If this file is missing, config is built from env vars: TOOLS_ENABLED, TOOLS_MODE, TOOLS_ALLOWED, SHELL_TOOL_ENABLED, SHELL_TOOL_MODE, etc.
_help.granting_access: To grant a new tool access in allowlist mode, add its name to global.allowedTools.
_help.revoking_access: Set the tool's 'enabled' to false, or set global mode to 'off' to disable everything.
